item.description:
Meetings will be the First and Third Tuesdays and possibly an occasional Sunday Afternoon.
Actually my own preference would be for the first Tuesday and third Sunday of each month.
Tuesdays would be discussions and Sundays more event oriented.
Examples of events:
A communal lunch
A hike in the woods
Meeting at a museum
Attending a movie
Community involvement
Tai Chi / meditation
Meeting at the Beach
Poetry
Art
Singing
etc.
item.name: Apex Naturalists organizing meeting
